contentList.content: This subclass mod is not currently installed.
(Not Installed) Shadow Sorcery

The Shadow Sorcery subclass is not currently installed. To use this Subclass, you must download the mod Shadow Sorcerer - Subclass, by Baaleos, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/923.
If you select this Subclass without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Storm Magic Subclass.
(Not Installed) The Celestial

The Celestial pact is not currently installed. To use this Pact, you must download the mod Celestial Warlock, by FluffyDragon24, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/1567.
If you select this Subclass without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Archfey pact.
(Not Installed) The Dread Overlord

The Dread Overlord pact is not currently installed. To use this Pact, you must download the mod Necromancer Subclass for Warlock - Dread Overlord, by dreadoverlord, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/394.
If you select this Subclass without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Archfey pact.
(Not Installed) Marksman

The Marksman subclass is not currently installed. To use this Subclass, you must download the mod Marksman - Fighter's Subclass, by afftor, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/1278.
If you select this Subclass without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Champion Subclass.
(Not Installed) Arcane Archer

The Arcane Archer subclass is not currently installed. To use this Subclass, you must download the mod Arcane Archer - Fighter Subclass, by ShivasShadow, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/1747?tab=posts.
If you select this Subclass without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Champion Subclass.
(Not Installed) The Hexblade

The Hexblade pact is not currently installed. To use this Pact, you must download the mod Hexblade Subclass, by Feriat111, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/1100.
If you select this Subclass without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Archfey pact.
(Not Installed) Way of Kensei

The Way of Kensei subclass is not currently installed. To use this Subclass, you must download the mod Monk Subclass -- Way of the Kensei, by YuukaYunna, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/1330.
If you select this Subclass without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Way of Four Elements Subclass.
(Not Installed) Way of Sun Soul

The Way of Sun Soul subclass is not currently installed. To use this Subclass, you must download the mod Way of Sun Soul (Monk Subclass), by Kingdomyoshi, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/1467.
If you select this Subclass without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Way of Four Elements Subclass.
(Not Installed) Way of Mercy

The Way of Mercy subclass is not currently installed. To use this Subclass, you must download the mod Way of Mercy (Monk Subclass), by PlatypusVenom, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/1749.
If you select this Subclass without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Way of Four Elements Subclass.
(Not Installed) War Magic

The War Magic Arcane Tradition is not currently installed. To use this Tradition, you must download the mod Wizard Traditions - War Magic, by fierrof, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/924.
If you select this Subclass without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Enchanting Tradition.
(Not Installed) Sorcery

The Sorcery Arcane Tradition is not currently installed. To use this Tradition, you must download the mod Sorcery Arcane Tradition (FULL RELEASE READY), by fmsette, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/446.
If you select this Subclass without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Enchanting Tradition.
(Not Installed) Combat Medic

The Combat Medic subclass is not currently installed. To use this Subclass, you must download the mod Diamon's Mystic Manual, by Backburner26, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/1599.
If you select this Subclass without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Champion Subclass.
(Not Installed) Psychopath

The Psychopath subclass is not currently installed. To use this Subclass, you must download the mod Diamon's Mystic Manual, by Backburner26, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/1599.
If you select this Subclass without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Champion Subclass.
(Not Installed) Artful Dodger

The Artful Dodger subclass is not currently installed. To use this Subclass, you must download the mod Diamon's Mystic Manual, by Backburner26, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/1599.
If you select this Subclass without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Champion Subclass.
(Not Installed) Bladesinging

The Bladesinger Arcane Tradition is not currently installed. To use this Tradition, you must download the mod Expansion (Bladesinger Only) by DiZ91891, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/279.
If you select this Subclass without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Enchanting Tradition.
(Not Installed) College of Glamour

The College of Glamour is not currently installed. To use this College, you must download the mod Bard Subclass - College of Glamour by Bonebreaker687, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/741.
If you select this College without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the College of Swords.
(Not Installed) Death Domain

The Death Domain is not currently installed. To use this Domain, you must download the mod Cleric Subclasses - Release by baltavi, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/432.
If you select this Domain without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Knowledge Domain.
(Not Installed) Arcana Domain

The Arcana Domain is not currently installed. To use this Domain, you must download the mod Cleric Subclasses - Release by baltavi, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/432.
If you select this Domain without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Knowledge Domain.

The Forge Domain is not currently installed. To use this Domain, you must download the mod Cleric Subclasses - Release by baltavi, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/432.
If you select this Domain without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Knowledge Domain.

The Grave Domain is not currently installed. To use this Domain, you must download the mod Cleric Subclasses - Release by baltavi, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/432.
If you select this Domain without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Knowledge Domain.

The Order Domain is not currently installed. To use this Domain, you must download the mod Cleric Subclasses - Release by baltavi, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/432.
If you select this Domain without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Knowledge Domain.

The Peace Domain is not currently installed. To use this Domain, you must download the mod Cleric Subclasses - Release by baltavi, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/432.
If you select this Domain without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Knowledge Domain.

The Twilight Domain is not currently installed. To use this Domain, you must download the mod Cleric Subclasses - Release by baltavi, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/432.
If you select this Domain without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Knowledge Domain.
(Not Installed) Phantom

The Phantom Subclass is not currently installed. To use this Subclass, you must download the mod Rogues Extra FullGameReady by lostsoulman, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/189.
If you select this Subclass without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Assassin Subclass.
(Not Installed) Inquisitive (lostsoulman)

The Inquisitive Subclass is not currently installed. To use this Subclass, you must download the mod Rogues Extra FullGameReady by lostsoulman, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/189.
If you select this Subclass without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Assassin Subclass.

If you select this Subclass without the subclass mod installed, you will use the progressions from the Assassin Subclass.

(Not Installed) Death Domain (CrackerJackGCO)

The Death Domain is not currently installed. To use this Domain, you must download the mod Death Domain Subclass for Cleric by CrackerJackGCO, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/baldursgate3/mods/1552.
